page.title: 20Government Offices, Wick
page.content: The Government Offices situated at Girnigoe Street consists of the Department of Employment, Department of Health and Social Security, Job centre, Department of Agriculture and Fisheries, and the Tax Department. Information from the Job centre stated that 25.9% of the males from the area served (John O'Groats to Bonar Bridge),and 9.1% of the females were unemployed.There are not very many jobs available at the moment, Dounreay and Kestrel Marine offering the most. There are a few seasonal jobs such as hotel work but these offer no long term employment opportunities. The outlook for school leavers is very poor but it is hoped that the proposed extension of Dounreay will bring more jobs to the county.
